txt2img_basic.description: Basic text to image generation with negative prompt support

img2img_basic.description: Convert an input image to a new image based on text prompts

txt2img_upscale.description: Generate an image from text and upscale it with a 2-pass highres fix

txt2img_with_lora.description: Text to image generation with LoRA model support

txt2video_basic.description: Generate a video from text using AnimateDiff

controlnet_canny.description: Image generation guided by canny edge detection

txt2img_sdxl.description: Text to image using SDXL base and refiner models

txt2img_tiled.description: Generate large images using tiled vae decode

img2img_style_transfer.description: Transfer style from reference image to input image
